
mt4_hst
=======


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/package_name.svg
   :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/mt4_hst
   :alt: Latest PyPI version


Usage
-----

.. code-block::

   import mt4_hst
   df = mt4_hst.read_hst('pass to hst file')

This method returns ``pandas.DataFrame``.

Installation
------------

.. code-block::

   pip install mt4_hst
